node.address: Carrera 4 #9-80, La Candelaria Centro , Bogota, Colombia

content.value: Featuring free Wi-Fi access throughout, Zohar Hostel offers desktop computers for guest use. It is located 450 m from Plaza de Bolivar and 10 minutes' walk from Monsterrat's Mountain and from Gold Museum in Bogot√°.
The rooms feature cable TV and either private or shared bathroom facilities. All bathrooms at this colonial-style property have showers and hot water.
Zohar Hostel is 50 m from the Militar museum and from Botero Museum. El Dorado International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

description.description: Welcome to Zohar Hostel we are located in a beautiful colonial house in the heart of la candelaria historic center, the best and safe location of the area since we have presidential guards 24 hours right in front of the hostel for your own peace of mind. From Zohar hostel you can walk to all the museums and point of interest of the area.
